body.p: The equity of some entities includes:

li.p: instruments that participate in dividends with ordinary shares according to a predetermined formula (for example, two for one) with, at times, an upper limit on the extent of participation (for example, up to, but not beyond, a specified amount per share).
a class of ordinary shares with a different dividend rate from that of another class of ordinary shares but without prior or senior rights.
